The conduit of comfort Containing sundrie comfortable prayers, to the strengthening of the faith of a weak Christian. By Abr. Fleming. Fleming, Abraham, 1552?-1607.
The fifth impression.
[368] p.
By A[ugustine] M[athewes] and are to be sold by Fr. Groue at his shop without Newgate, Printed at London : 1624.
Printer's name from STC. Identified as STC 11037a on UMI microfilm. Signatures: A-Z. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
